[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview-decoder](./harp-mapview-decoder.md) &gt; [TileLoader](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader._constructor_.md)

## TileLoader.(constructor)

Set up loading of a single \[\[Tile\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(dataSource: DataSource, tileKey: TileKey, dataProvider: DataProvider, tileDecoder: ITileDecoder, priority: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataSource | [DataSource](./harp-mapview.datasource.md) | The \[\[DataSource\]\] the tile belongs to. |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | The quadtree address of a \[\[Tile\]\]. |
|  dataProvider | [DataProvider](./harp-mapview-decoder.dataprovider.md) | The \[\[DataProvider\]\] that retrieves the binary tile data. |
|  tileDecoder | [ITileDecoder](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiledecoder.md) | The \[\[ITileDecoder\]\] that decodes the binary tile to a \[\[DecodeTile\]\]. |
|  priority | number | The priority given to the loading job. Highest number will be served first. |
